title: Inc Loop
content:
[[iftags +样版]]
= **作者：**[[*user Boyu12]]

----

包含 ListUsers 变量的 [[include]]。

+* 使用方法

> ##red|[[module ListUsers users="."]]##
> [[include :scp-wiki:component:inc-loop c=@@__________@@|p=**<include 地址>**]]
> |<变量名>=**%%name%%**
> ]]
> ##red|[[/module]]##
> 
> ----
> 
> ##red|[[include :scp-wiki:component:listusers-1 users="."]]##
> [[include :scp-wiki:component:inc-loop c=@@__________@@|p=**component:image-block**]]
> |name=image.png
> |align=center
> |width=100%
> |caption=@@//%%name%%//@@
> ]]
> ##red|[[include :scp-wiki:component:listusers-2]]##
> [[include component:image-block
> |name=image.png
> |align=center
> |width=100%
> |caption=@@//游客//@@
> ]]
> ##red|[[include :scp-wiki:component:listusers-3]]##
>> >> [[[component:listusers-1|支持非 Wikidot 用户的 ListUsers 模块]]]

[[/iftags]]

[[iftags -样版]]

[[div style="margin: 2em 0; border: solid 2px #FFC107;"]]
[[div_ style="display: inline-block; padding: 0 3px; font-size: 1.5em; background: #FFC107; color: #ffffff; font-weight: bold;"]]
[[span class="fa fa-exclamation-triangle" style="font-size: 1.4em;"]]@< >@[[/span]]出错了！
[[/div]]
[[div_ style="padding: 5px 7px;"]]
你所使用的 {{[[include]]}} 地址有误，请使用 {{[[include :scp-wiki:component:inc-loop]]}}。
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[/iftags]]
author: Sekai_s
